meanings.sent1: Dad will motorises the boat for our fishing trip.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic motorises the car to make it run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The toy company decided to motorises the new remote-controlled cars for extra fun.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a self-motorising wheelchair fascinated the inventor.
meanings.sent5: The factory motorises the assembly line to increase production speed.

meanings.definition: Operate or propel with a motor.
meanings.sent1: She motorises the lawnmower to trim the grass in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The captain motorises the ship to sail across the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The robot motorises around the room, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: His determination motorises him to achieve his goals despite challenges.
meanings.sent5: The engine motorises the plane, lifting it into the sky smoothly.
